description: Full status check with mocked providers
prompt: Check all my API provider balances and limits and give me a full report.
expectations: Report includes a summary section with provider counts
Each configured provider shows status (OK/WARNING/ERROR)
Unconfigured providers are listed as unconfigured
Report includes balance information where available
Report includes rate limit information where available
Low balances are flagged with warnings
Errors (bad API keys) are clearly reported
Recommendations section appears if there are warnings or errors
Report is formatted cleanly and is easy to scan

prompt: Just check my Anthropic and OpenAI API status.
expectations: Only Anthropic and OpenAI are checked
Other providers are not mentioned or are skipped
Rate limit info from headers is displayed for Anthropic
OpenAI balance or billing info is shown if available

prompt: Run the API status check and give me the raw JSON output.
expectations: Output is valid JSON
JSON contains an array of provider result objects
Each result has status, provider, and checked_at fields
Limits and balance fields are present (may be null)

notes: Run with no environment variables set
expectations: All providers shown as UNCONFIGURED
Clear message explaining how to configure API keys
No errors or crashes
Instructions point to environment variable names
